title: Greenlanders Vote Leftists Into Power, Putting Fate Of Rare Earth Mine In Doubt
content:
1. Greenlanders Vote Leftists Into Power, Putting Fate Of Rare Earth Mine In Doubt  NPR
  2. Greenland election to decide fate of rare earth mining  TRT World
  3. China’s Rare-Earths Quest Upends Greenland’s Government  The Wall Street Journal
  4. A Row Over Rare-Earth Deposits Could Bring Down Greenland's Government  NPR
  5. Left-wing party wins Greenland election, opposes big mining project  Reuters

localize.title: グリーンランドの人々が左派に投票し、レアアース鉱山の存続が危ぶまれる。
格陵兰人投票给左派上台，使稀土矿的命运受到怀疑。
格陵蘭人投票給左派上臺，使稀土礦的命運受到懷疑。
